short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivational Quote wallpaper turn new tab to Motivational Quotes background. Custom Motivational Quotes theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through Motivational Quote wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Select or randomize your Motivational Quote background using the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize a Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Display the current date and time automatically.
6. Create notes for task management.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Add shortcuts for faster navigation to preferred websites.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with easy access.
12. Simplified sharing to social media platforms.
13. Direct download options for wallpapers.
14. Quick links to games.
15. Enjoy seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new tab.
